text: Saulo Rodrigues dos Santos (born February 18, 1982), known as Saulo, is a Brazilian footballer who plays for Santa Helena as a striker. ==References== ==External links== *Saulo at ZeroZero Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Brazilian expatriate footballers Category:F.C.
